original_text: And to whom did God swear that they would never enter his rest if not to those who disobeyed?
korean_text: 또 하나님이 누구에게 맹세하사 그의 안식에 들어오지 못하리라 하셨느냐 곧 순종하지 아니하던 자들에게가 아니냐

sentences.original_text: And to whom did God swear
that they would never enter his rest
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 결코 그의 안식에 들어가지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: if not to those who disobeyed?
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 순종하지 않은 자들이 아니라면 누구인가?
